#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 into 996`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1}
ELSA_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w1_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w1_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -1 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup[i] = 0 }
  else if(ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w1_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
}

ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup), "NA='999'")
ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w1$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 into 996`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo2}
ELSA_ds_w2 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w2_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w2_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -1 & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -1 & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -1 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup[i] = 0 }

  else if(ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w2_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
}

ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup), "NA='999'")
ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w2$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 into 996`
* `-8 into 998`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo4}
ELSA_ds_w4 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w4_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w4_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) & ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup[i] = 0 }
  else if(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -1 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -1 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -1 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -1 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -1 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
  else if(ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w4_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -8 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup[i] = 998 }
}

ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w4$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 or -2 into 996`
* `-8 into 998`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo5}
ELSA_ds_w5 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w5_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w5_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup[i] = 0 }
  else if(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
  else if(ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w5_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -8 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup[i] = 998 }
}

ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup), "NA='999'")
ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w5$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 or -2 into 996`
* `-8 into 998`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo6}
ELSA_ds_w6 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w6_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w6_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup[i] = 0 }
  else if(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
  else if(ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w6_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -8 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup[i] = 998 }
}

ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup), "NA='999'")
ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w6$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r local7, echo=F}
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[3], caption = 'scfrdc')
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = vbl_miss)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(ELSA_w7_emot_sup, aes(x=factor(scfrdc))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable equals 1 or 2 then 1`
* `if all are equal 3 or 4 then 0`
* `-1 or -2 into 996`
* `-8 into 998`
* `-9 into 995`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo7}
ELSA_ds_w7 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w7_emot_sup$id)

ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb), "NA='-999'")
ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc), "NA='-999'")


ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup <- c(NA)
for(i in 1:dim(ELSA_w7_emot_sup)[1]){
  if( ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(1,2) | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(1,2) | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup[i] = 1 }
  else if(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup[i] = 996 }
  else if(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) & ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] %in% c(3,4,-1,-2) ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup[i] = 0 }
  else if(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -9 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -9 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -9 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup[i] = 995 }
  else if(ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptra[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scptrc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scchdc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfama[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfamc[i] == -8 | 
    ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrda[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdb[i] == -8 | ELSA_w7_emot_sup$scfrdc[i] == -8 ) { 
  ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup[i] = 998 }
}

ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup <- car::recode(as.vector(ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup), "NA='999'")
ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w7$emot_sup, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r final, echo=F}
l.hds <- list(w1 = ELSA_ds_w1, w2 = ELSA_ds_w2, w3 = ELSA_ds_w3, w4 = ELSA_ds_w4, w5 = ELSA_ds_w5, w6 = ELSA_ds_w6, w7 = ELSA_ds_w7)

  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label # Text value assigned at the DS description, at the top
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cat_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cat_label[1:2])
  m_name <- paste0("ELSA_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  rm(aux_object)
}
```
